title: How Often Do You Get an Instant Feedback Report? (Gauging the System)
body:
Before I go on, I want to make it clear that I am **NOT** complaining about the Instant Feedback system.

I'm in mid-silver this season (as usual) and I get a lot of ragers and people just constantly giving up/int'ing. Naturally, I do report every person I see being just a headache and making the game unproductive. The rate at which I report is probably 2-3 a day, daring to believe the system works.

What surprises me is this: I get an Instant Feedback a minimum of FIVE A WEEK. I log in for the day - I get a notification. Come out of a game - another notification. I don't know what to make of this number, so that's why I'm making this post. 

Like the title, really want to know: how often do you guys get a feedback report after reporting someone? Am I actually reporting correctly or am I just unlucky enough to have people like this cross me? Or is this just a normal volume of Instant Feedback reports to get?

I love this game and I want to do the best I can. I honestly am not looking to condemn {{champion:67}}  people at all, but I'm not going to pass on the chance to stop someone from making the game a worse experience for the next person that has to queue with this person.

PS: Yes, I do report "ggez." If you're the type to do so, knock it off. You won. We lost. Making your opponent feel worse is a form of toxicity we don't need.
